before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"d0bfr","text":"Make sure to properly prepare your buffers (e.g. heating, adding ethanol)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"crm63","text":"This protocol is derived from the QIAamp DNA micro kit (QIAGEN) protocol and was used to extract DNA from whole or parts of zooplanktonic freshwater crustaceans (Copepoda, Branchiopoda, ...) from New Caledonia.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: DNA, Extraction, crustacean, freshwater, PNDB, BOREA

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8j1oi","text":"Prepare your 50 tubes with one individual per well. Alternate genus in the wells to detect eventual contamination between wells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4ni85","text":"Collect one individual from a sample","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8d859","text":"Note its genus and determine its sex with a binocular microscope","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f8lqb","text":"For big individuals (more than 5 mm), dissect a few legs and put it in the well. Be careful not to damage the rest of the body and put it in a tagged Eppendorf tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"der8k","text":"For little individuals (less than 5 mm), put the whole body.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4kt05","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"atra4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"bu7ou","text":"If necessary, use alcool to get the biological material to fall at the bottom of the well","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"epp6","text":"When all tubes are filled, the biological material has to dry before going to lysis","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cdv9g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3jces","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"12pl4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"84mbo","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2fef5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fa80t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5hdi4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"rmav","text":" If necessary, use a micropipette to empty an excess of alcool in the well","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"safety","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6kg3q","text":"Make sure the plate is closed when you want to transport it elsewhere","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"23die","text":"Prepare the lysis","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1o9d","text":"Add    in each well and equilibrate to room temperature","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"43j6b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"180","error":false,"guid":"17FEBE502DC911ECAE61E5BB3B170C7B","id":0,"label":"ATL buffer","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ariv3","text":"Put your tubes in a proofer at      to lyse the tissues","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":31,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":34,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"F17378122DC911EC9FDA0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"56","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":0,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"F17379832DC911EC9FDA0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"(6h or more)","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"56","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5ja9d","text":"Perform the DNA extraction manually","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6743q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2snt","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7sqt6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ck25o","text":"When manually extracting DNA alone, do not do all 50 tubes at once as timing is short between each step. A maximum of twenty tubes can be done simultaneously. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"A0DF0BB10CB64A7094E11C4605801862"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dpnbj","text":"Add   in each tube and mix by pulse-vortexing for   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":50,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ig43","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"78961C302DCA11ECAE61E5BB3B170C7B","id":0,"label":"AL buffer (+RNAse if suited)","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":15,"guid":"FB0EE9A03EB811EF9A970A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4t1ar","text":"Add   in the column, centrifuge   , discard the collection tube containing the flow through and place the column in a clean 2mL collection tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":32,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ei78u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"AW1 buffer","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"8000","duration":60,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"6F534E543EBC11EF9A970A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bouc2","text":"Add   in the column, centrifuge   , discard the collection tube containing the flow through and place the column in a clean 2mL collection tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":32,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"94B5E2033EBC11EFB4F60A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"AW2 buffer","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","centrifuge":"8000","duration":60,"error":false,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"6F534E543EBC11EF9A970A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4cc89","text":"Centrifuge   to dry the membrane completely.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":11,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6fgu2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"","duration":180,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"Full speed","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d2c20","text":"Place the column in a clean, closable, eppendorf tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4dhvv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c1190","text":"Add  in each well, mix by pulse-vortexing for   and briefly centrifuge","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":46,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"50dge","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"201842A02DC911ECAE61E5BB3B170C7B","id":0,"label":"K proteinase","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":15,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"47rho","text":"Add   in each tube, mix by pulse-vortexing for   , incubate at room temperature for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":47,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":84,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1u1lt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"82A381402DCA11ECAE61E5BB3B170C7B","id":0,"label":"96-100% ethanol","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":15,"guid":"FB0EE9A03EB811EF9A970A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b4g87","text":"Optional steps, if RNA carrier is needed : Quantity for twenty tubes (using 20 volumes + 2 margin to avoid errors = 22 volumes)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":41}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"atq0u","text":"Mix    with   and mix until dissolved.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":12,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5ma0h","text":"Mix   with   (  and mix.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":11,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":14,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8l8u0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"22","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"solid RNA carrier","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"22","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"AE buffer","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"22","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"of the AE + RNAse mix","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"4400","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"AL buffer","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"4":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"per volume) ","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"apu86","text":"Briefly centrifuge to remove drops from the lid.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5rlft","text":"Prepare all the eluting columns by puting each in a 2mL collection tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6dnm1","text":"Transfer the prepared DNA lysate into the eluting column with a pipette, centrifuge the column   , discard the collection tube containing the flow through and place the column in a clean 2mL collection tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":95,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2f2h2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1nlo0","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ccjsb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"69j0t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"8000","duration":60,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}},"1":{"type":"safety","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"d6t01","text":"Make sure the column is empty of liquid. If not, centrifuge at higher speed until it is.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"2CD2C253CFD14437A79C4D0587E8D6E2"}}}}
